description: Very long tangent-heavy conversation (parking lot drama, car shopping, gas prices, cookies) with scheduling info at the very end: product launch rehearsal next Thursday at 3 PM.

events.title: Product Launch Rehearsal
events.attendees: Alice, Bob, Carol, Dave, Marketing Team
events.reasoning: Alice informs Bob about a product launch rehearsal requested by marketing for next Thursday at 3 PM. Located in the event space on the first floor, about 2 hours. Bob confirms availability.

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 1 event: product launch rehearsal next Thursday at 3 PM. The majority of the conversation was off-topic tangents.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'next Thursday' is 2026-02-26. 60+ lines with the real scheduling info appearing only in the last quarter of the conversation.
